text: Yislel binɨb kɨli takaw teplep ak yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨlak, anɨb ak tek kɨli binɨb God ayɨp penpen gep ne okok tek mɨdebal. Pen anɨgek, nɨbi binɨb Juda mel okok mɨdtep gebɨm. God pen bɨlel kɨli binɨb yad yenɨgel agɨl kɨlop aglek, kɨli binɨb mapen ne mɨdebal. Ne based kɨli gos nɨgɨlɨg mɨdɨl anɨgup.
